item.text: Now I mean that the heir, as long as he is a minor, is no different from a slave, though he is the owner of everything.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="2012" class="">guardians</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3623" class="">managers</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="4287">date set</st> by his<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st>.

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st>, <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3516" class="">minors</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1402" class="">enslaved</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="4747">basic forces</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="4138" class="">appropriate</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> had <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1821">sent out</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="1096" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, <st data-num="1096" class="">born</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,

<st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1805" class="">redeem</st> those who were <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> we may <st data-num="618">be</st> <st data-num="5206">adopted as sons</st> <st data-num="618">with full rights</st>.<n id="1" />
And because you are sons, God sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts, who calls “Abba! Father!”
So you are no longer a slave but a son, and if you are a son, then you are also an heir through God.
Formerly when you did not know God, you were enslaved to beings that by nature are not gods at all.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> that you have come to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> (<st data-num="1161" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> to be <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>), <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> can you <st data-num="1994">turn back</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4434" class="">worthless</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4747">basic forces</st>?<n id="2" /> Do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to be <st data-num="1398" class="">enslaved</st> to <st data-num="3739">them</st> all <st data-num="509" class="">over</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>?<n id="3" />

You are <st data-num="3906">observing religious</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">seasons</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1763" class="">years</st>.

I <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> that my <st data-num="2872" class="">work</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> may have been <st data-num="1500">in vain</st>.
I beg you, brothers and sisters, become like me, because I have become like you. You have done me no wrong!
But you know it was because of a physical illness that I first proclaimed the gospel to you,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> though <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4561">physical condition</st> put <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to the <st data-num="3986" class="">test</st>, you did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1848" class="">despise</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1609" class="">reject</st> me.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235">Instead</st>, you <st data-num="1209" class="">welcomed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as though</st> I were an <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613">as though</st> I were <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> himself!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> is <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3108">sense of happiness</st><n id="1" /> now? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> about <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> it were <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st>, you would have <st data-num="1846">pulled out</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> and <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> them to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!
So then, have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?
They court you eagerly, but for no good purpose; they want to exclude you, so that you would seek them eagerly.

<st data-num="1161">However</st>, it is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st><n id="1" /> to be <st data-num="2206" class="">sought eagerly</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> purpose<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3842">at all times</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">when</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3918" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="5043">children</st>—I am <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> <st data-num="5605">undergoing birth pains</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is <st data-num="3445" class="">formed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!<n id="1" />
I wish I could be with you now and change my tone of voice, because I am perplexed about you.
Tell me, you who want to be under the law, do you not understand the law?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it is <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3814">slave woman</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">other</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1658">free woman</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588">one</st>, the son <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3814">slave woman</st>, was <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="2596">by</st> <st data-num="4561">natural descent</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161">while</st> <st data-num="3588">the other</st>, the son <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="1658">free woman</st>, was <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st>.

<st data-num="3748" class="">These things</st> may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="238">treated as an allegory</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3778">these women</st> <st data-num="1510">represent</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="1242" class="">covenants</st>. <st data-num="3391" class="">One</st> is <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="4614" class="">Sinai</st> <st data-num="1080">bearing children</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1397" class="">slavery;</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="28" class="">Hagar</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="28" class="">Hagar</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">represents</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="4614" class="">Sinai</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="688" class="">Arabia</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4960" class="">corresponds</st> to the <st data-num="3568" class="">present</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> she <st data-num="1398">is in slavery</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="507" class="">above</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3748">she</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.

For it is written:

“Rejoice, O barren woman who does not bear children;

break forth and shout, you who have no birth pains,

because the children of the desolate woman are more numerous

than those of the woman who has a husband.”
But you, brothers and sisters, are children of the promise like Isaac.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> <st data-num="5119">at that time</st> the one <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4561">natural descent</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st> the one <st data-num="1080" class="">born</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> it is <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>.
But what does the scripture say? “Throw out the slave woman and her son, for the son of the slave woman will not share the inheritance with the son” of the free woman.
Therefore, brothers and sisters, we are not children of the slave woman but of the free woman.
